Title: AtomEncd
Game: P3FES, P4, P4D, P4G, P5, P5D, P5R, CFB, PQ, PQ2
Author: Du'Slingr
Description: A GUI interface for creating custom ADX and HCA audio files using CriAtomEncoder.

Title: PersonaFont
Game: P3FES, P4, P4D, P4G, P5, P5D, P5R, CFB, SMT3, PQ, PQ2
Author: Meloman19
Description: A tool to decompress and recompress Persona 3, 4 and 5's .FNT files.

Title: P4G Save Editor
Author: Fendroidus
Description: Edits decrypted savedata bin files dumped from P4G.

Title: RMD Maxscript
Author: TGE
Description: A tool for loading model and animation data from RMDs in 3DSMax. Extract the included scripts, EXE and folder to the same directory together to extract textures when loading the model. Can be used with Amicitia for model hacking, but make sure to export with the axis set to Z-up instead of Y-up.

Title: BFMessageScriptEditor
Author: TGE
Description: tool for extracting and replacing BMD files within BF scripts (as decompiled MSG files) without the need for recompiling the BF itself. Useful as an alternative to the compiler to avoid issues when all you want to do is simple text edits.

Title: PKGView
Description: A program for extracting the contents of Playstation Network PKG files.

Title: CriPakGUI
Author: CaptainSwag101
Description: A GUI for extracting files from CPK archives.

Title: DCMovieCreator
Description: A tool for making custom SFD video files. Used for the animated cutscenes and openings.

Title: PuyoTools
Description: A tool for packing/unpacking ADX files in AFS Archives. Useful for cutscene voice clips and battle sounds.

Title: UMDGen
Description: A program for extracting and replacing files from PSP UMDs/ISOs.

Title: GMD/GFS/GAP Import Maxscript
Game: P5, P3D, P4D, P5D, P5R, CFB
Author: TGE, DeathChaos
Description: A maxscript for 3DSMax that allows you to import GMD models and GAP animations from Persona 5.
Update:
Update 12/14/2020:
v0.16:
- Added P5R key types (34 and 35, PSHalf and RSHalf).
- Added missing PRHalf keytype support (should make all Persona Dancing physics animations load now).
v0.17:
-Fixed Morph target mesh reading code, should now read all of them correctly.
-Added full support for loading Persona Dancing Morph Target animations
-Added Camera support for Persona Dancing, should load model and camera animation without issues
-Fixed weights being incorrectly applied in some instances;
-There should no longer be models with random unrigged vertices
-There should no longer be models with incorrect weights
Guide Text: Loading GMD Models and Animations in 3DSMax

Title: EVTTool
Author: TGE
Description: Drag an EVT file from Persona 5's event folder onto this EXE to convert it to an editable JSON. Edit with your favorite text processor (like notepad++) and drag it back onto the EXE to convert it back to EVT.

Title: DDS2Tool
Author: ShrineFox
Description: A tool for extracting and building BIN files that contain DDS bustups.

Title: BustupParamEditor
Author: ShrineFox
Description: WIP editor for element positioning of P5's bustups.

Title: P4U2 Mod Tools
Author: lipsum
Description:
Includes:
bddata - bddata.bin extraction tools
p4u2mod - custom game update creation tool
patch - patch files for use with rpcs3

Title: PM1 Message Script Editor
Author: TGE
Description: Unpacks and repacks text from PM1 (event) files as MSG files that you can edit.

Title: ACBEditor
Game: P5, P3D, P4D, P5D, P5R, CFB
Author: Skyth
Description: A tool for unpacking/repacking AWB audio archives using their corresponding ACB.

Title: P5 EPL Injector
Author: TGE
Description: Drag an EPL file from Persona 5 onto this EXE to extract all GMD files. Drag a folder containing GMD files onto the EXE to repack the EPL file. Useful for editing effect models or All Out Attack images.
Update:
Update 5/20/2019:
- Now you can edit elemental affinities for any Persona in UNIT.TBL!

Title: PQ CheatEngine Table
Author: lipsum
Description: A cheat table for Persona Q, for use while playing on Citra.

Title: GFDStudio
Game: P5, P3D, P4D, P5D, P5R, CFB
Author: TGE
Description: A model viewer and editor for GMD/GFD files from various titles. Also supports editing and viewing animations in GAP files.

Title: EVTEditor
Author: ShrineFox
Tags: EVT, BIN, BF, BMD, MSG, FLOW, GUI
Description: A GUI for editing events in Persona 5 Using EVTTool, AtlusScriptCompiler & AtlusFileSystemLibrary by TGEnigma

Title: PS4 Bustup Repacker
Author: ShrineFox
Description: Unpacks and repacks Persona 5 (PS4)'s bustup BINs. Drag a folder containing PS4 Bustup BINs onto this EXE to Unpack OR Drag an unpacked folder containing GNF files onto this EXE to Repack

Title: Persona5NameTableEditor
Author: ShrineFox
Description: You can use this to edit strings in the NAME.TBL until a better solution comes along. Only works with unedited Persona 5 NAME.TBL for now.

Title: PQ2 CheatEngine Table
Author: lipsum
Description: A cheat table for Persona Q2, for use while playing on Citra.

Title: io_plg
Author: lipsum
Description: A Blender Import-Export addon for the PLG format mesh collections found in some Atlus games. With this script you can import a PLG file to a blender mesh collection, or export a mesh collection to a PLG file.

Title: BustupParamEditorGUI
Author: ShrineFox
Description: New version of BustupParamEditor that allows you to change the values for X and Y positioning of the mouth, eyes, or the entire bustup. You can also add/rename entries, create new bustup .bin files, and repack edited images back into P5's bustup .bin format.
Update:
Update 11/15/2019:
- Allow adding/renaming entries, creating new .bin files
- Automatically tries to recover last param/bustup dir path at startup
- Uses values from param file to select bustups now instead of static list of names
- Appends new entries to selected params file
- Can now create .bins for param entries that lack one
- Can now rename existing/unused entries instead of adding them

Title: P4G Mod Support
Author: lipsum
Description:
Includes (for P4G US/JP):
- a patch that enables mod.cpk support (no more repacking 1.8GB data.cpk every single time)
- an intro skip patch
- an auto patching script
- a mod that serves as an indicator to see if mod.cpk support is enabled + fixes an annoying bug in US P4G's title screen (in Mod Compendium and prepackaged form)
Update:
Note:
Use this custom build of the Mod Compendium for now to make mod.cpk files for P4G.

Title: 010 Editor GFD Template
Author: TGE
Description: 010 Editor Template for GMD/GFS/BED/EPL/EPT/BFL. Now with full support for EPL.

Title: RPCS3PatchEboot
Author: TGE
Description: Application that applies patches in a RPCS3 patch.yml file and applies it to the EBOOT file directly.
Update:
Update 1/20/2020:
- Support for Vita EBOOT/ELFs
- Misc. bug fixes
- Support for tabs
- Support for decimal numbers

Title: Persona 5 Cutin Tool
Author: CelestialAmber, rxys
Description:
Tool for packing and decompressing the Persona 5 Cutin .dds images. Ported from this Python script by yukinogatari: https://github.com/yukinogatari/Reverse-Engineering/blob/master/Persona%205/p5_unpack.py
Usage: P5CutinTool cutinDir
Update:
Update 2/3/2020:
Now supports recompressing cutins thanks to rxys.

Title: P5R Animation Backport (GFDStudio Fork)
Author: Elvagan
Description: GFD Studio Fork that will automatically convert P5R Animations to be loadable in P5 vanilla. It's still not in a release state so you'll need to compile it by yourself to test it. But I believe some people might be interested with it :)

Title: xacttool
Author: TGE
Description:
WIP tool for extracting/modifying XWB files.


Known issues
- Extracting some XWB files crashes the program such as ROOT.xwb. You can alternatively use unxwb for this.

Usage
Replaces BGM019/index 20 with BGM019.wav with the loop information set:
xacttool -wb "BGM.xwb" -r "BGM019.wav" -ls 717056 -le 4511872
Extracts the waves from the XWB file:
xacttool -wb "BGM.xwb" -x

Title: Persona 4 Golden Save Converter
Author: lipsum
Description:
https://github.com/zarroboogs/p4g-saveconv

convert_vita2pc.py is a utility that converts P4G PS Vita saves to P4G PC saves:
  • PS Vita data00XX.bin and system.bin files are converted to the PC format (see FAQ #1 in README.md).
  • PS Vita sdslot.dat file is converted to PC data00XX.binslot files (see FAQ #2 in README.md).
This tool will convert the above into proper PC .bin/.binslot files.

There's no need to edit any hashes manually.

convert_pc2vita.py is a utility that converts P4G PC saves to P4G PS Vita saves by reversing the actions described above.

WARNING: REMEMBER TO BACKUP YOUR SAVES BEFORE USING THIS TOOL.

Title: P5 Table Editor
Author: SeppNel
Description: This is a command line tool that leets you edit any ftd file, at least from p5 I don't know if any other games uses it.
Update: Update 1.3: -Add support for ftd version 1 files (because apparently that it's a thing.) If you tried it before and got garbage output try now.

Title: Persona 4 Golden CheatEngine Table
Author: lipsum
Description: A cheat table for the PC version of Persona 4 Golden.

Title: PackTools
Game: P3FES, P4, P4D, P4G, P5, P5D, P5R, CFB, SMT3, PQ, PQ2
Author: TGE
Tags: PakPack, ACXPack, DDS3Pack, LBPack, SMT1Pack, ACX, IMG, PAK, PAC, BIN, LB, DDT
Description:
Commandline tools by TGE for extracting and repacking various archives.
ACXPack: pack, unpack, or replace contents of ACX files
DDS3Pack: pack, unpack, or replace contents of DDS3's img/ddt
LBPack: pack, unpack, or replace contents of LB files
PakPack: pack, unpack, or replace contents of PAK/PAC/BIN files
DDS3Pack: pack, unpack, or replace contents of SMT1's DATA.BIN
Update: Update 7/8/2020: Fix PAK v2 & v3 not being aligned correctly

Title: Amicitia
Game: P3FES, P3D, P4, P4D, P4G, P5, P5D, P5R, CFB, SMT3, PQ, PQ2
Author: TGE, Fendroidus
Tags: TMX, RMD, SPR, PAC, PAK, ARC, ARK, AMD, TXD, BIN
Description: A multi-use tool for hacking Persona games. Can open a variety of different Atlus formats, such as: TMX, SPR, PAC/BIN and RenderWare formats: RMD and TXD. Use this to make custom textures or import custom models!
Update:
Update 7/12/2020: BVP & Field pac editing bug fixes & improvements
Update 7/10/2020: PAK: fix stream being closed after saving
Update 6/22/2020: Fix TMX alpha not being scaled properly, Fix "Cannot access a closed file" bug when opening AMD files , Allow resaving and editing of TMX "UserId" values used to correctly rendering some graphics

Title: Binary Templates
Game: P3FES, P3D, P4, P4D, P4G, P5, P5D, P5R, CFB, SMT3, PQ, PQ2
Author: TGE, LillianGoulston
Description: Templates for 010 Editor that makes editing various formats easier.

Title: p4gpc.modloader
Author: TGE
Description: A mod loader for the Steam version of Persona 4 Golden, using Reloaded II for DLL injection. See the readme for more information.
Update:
Update 11/2/2020 (Development): CPK Redirection (use folder named cpk_e for mods instead of data00004 etc.) use preappfile to dump files referenced by cpk rather than extract PAKs.
Update 7/10/2020: Log to p4gpc.modloader.log.txt in the P4G installation folder when the console is enabled

Title: P4GMOdelConverter
Author: ShrineFox
Description: A tool for creating working P4G custom models. Converts FBX and GMO models to MDS (an editable text format) and back, with support for correcting issues that prevent custom models from rendering correctly in P4G. You can also optionally dump TM2 textures and quickly re-order animations.
Update: 7/23/2020 : Added PC Support, Animation management, viewing and conversion options

Title: Atlus Script Tools
Game: P3FES, P4, P4G, P5, P5R, PQ, PQ2, SMT3
Author: TGE
Description:
WIP set of tools developed for handling Atlus' script formats including:
flow script files (.bf)
message script files (.bmd)
This can be used to change/add dialog to several Atlus games that use BF/BMD (including Persona 4 & 5) and also modify the scripts that control certain aspects of the game like events, enemy AI etc.
Update:
Update 11/23/2020: - Fix variable indices when importing compiled flowscripts
Update 11/3/2020: - Fix negative float values being saved incorrectly to the file, Improve writing of large operands, add P5R efigs encoding
Update 2/11/2020: Add P3 & P3 FES libraries

Title: Aemulus (P4G Exe Editor)
Author: Tekka
Description: Aemulus means "Rival" in Latin. It uses .patch files (basically raw hex data with .patch extension) from your mods/patches folder in your Steam game directory to patch the exe at startup. It also now uses .tblpatch files (also raw hex data) from your mods/patches folder to edit your mods/data00004/init_free.bin at startup. I wanted to make it so that you can merge .tbl files so that the average end user doesn't have to open up a hex editor and merge it themselves.

Title: PersonaRandomizer (Beta)
Author: ShrineFox, TGE
Description: A largely untested WIP tool meant to randomize TBL values in Persona games. P5's ENCOUNT.TBL should work for randomized encounters.

Title: Mod Compendium
Game: P3FES, P4, P3D, P4D, P4G, P5, P5D, P5R, CFB, SMT3, PQ, PQ2
Author: TGE, ShrineFox, lipsum
Description: Easily create, combine and install multiple mods for Persona 3, 4, 5, P3P, P4G, P5R, PQ, PQ2, Catherine Full Body and the Dancing games.
Update:
Update 1/11/2021: Add P5R EUR support, add patches by lipsum for USA mod support and JP/USA intro skipUpdate 12/20/2020: Add P5R USA support
Update 9/30/2020: Add P5R Update PKG Creation
Update 6/22/2020: Add P4G PC Support
Update 4/12/2020: Fix P3/4 patching, add HostFS output, add option to sort mods by subfolder

Title: preeappfile (P4G PC CPK Tool)
Author: TGE
Description:
Archive (un)packer and code library for games developed by Preapp Partners, including the PC ports of Persona 4 Golden and the Neptunia games.

Usage instructions:
Drag and drop a CPK/PAC file onto preappfile to unpack.
Drag and drop a folder onto preappfile to pack it into a CPK and PAC file(s).
For further usage instructions, run preappfile with the '-h' or '--help' argument.

Title: Aemulus Package Manager
Author: Tekka, T-Pose Ratkechi, Pixelguin, Brolijah, ShrineFox
Description: No longer will you have to manually merge conflicting bin files found in different mods. This is the latest and greatest mod package manager, made specifically for Persona 4 Golden on PC. How to Use

Title: Unofficial P5R 010 Template
Author: Scarltz
Description: 010 Template for editing TBL files in Persona 5 Royal.

Title: P5 Character Swapper
Author: ShrineFox
Description:
A program that automatically replaces one character's models and animations with another. It attempts to match up outfit IDs and falls back to a default model (051 by default) if no match is found.
You can also optionally retarget models or animations from one character to another.

Title: AtlusScriptCompiler GUI
Game: P3FES, P4, P4G, P5, P5R, PQ, PQ2, SMT3
Author: ShrineFox, Tupelov
Description: Erase the hassle of using commandline arguments! Place this program in the same directory as AtlusScriptCompiler.exe and run it. You can select a game, drag BF/BMD files into the window, and let the GUI handle compiling. Likewise, you can convert FLOW/MSG back to BF/BMD by dragging. Optionally supports overwriting, showing the log, hooking commands and disassembly. Thanks to Tupelov for implementing the dark theme and several other needed features and bugfixes.

Title: CPK TMX Tool
Author: Tekka
Description: Extracts/Replaces TMX files from special CPK files found in the PS2 Persona Games.

Title: Party Skill Editor
Author: Phoenix, Tupelov
Description: A cheat code maker for Persona 3 FES that gives party members skills based on what level they are. Can be used to prepare a save for use with the New Moon balance patch.
